title: Powers, Vol. 1: Who Killed Retro Girl?
description: Heroes glide through the sky on lightning bolts and fire. Flamboyant villains attempt daring daylight robberies. God-like alien creatures clash in epic battle over the nighttime sky. And on the dirty city streets below, Homicide Detectives Christian Walker and Deena Pilgrim do their jobs. The mysterious death of Retro Girl was the case that launched one of the most celebrated comic series of the last decade and now...this newly formatted essential collection of the very first Powers storyline will introduce you to a world that won the prestigious Eisner award and made Bendis and Oeming comic superstars. This completely redesigned, reformatted, and reworked collection is perfect for new readers and old and will match the Bendis essential trades that Icon will be releasing throughout the year. Start your powers library here!! "Bendis is the funnypages descendant of Sam Fuller, Martin Scorsese and Quentin Tarantino..."- Entertainment Weekly"Bendis has rapidly become a true master of comic book creation!"- Comic Buyer's Guide
author: Brian Michael Bendis
